question: Tell me about yourself.
Why do you want this job?
What are your greatest strengths?
What are your weaknesses?
Why should we hire you?
Where do you see yourself in five years?
How do you handle stress and pressure?
What are your salary expectations?
Why did you leave your last job? (For experienced candidates)
How do you handle conflict in the workplace?
Describe a challenging situation you faced at work and how you handled it.
What motivates you?
Are you willing to relocate or travel?
How do you prioritize your tasks?
Do you prefer working alone or in a team?
What do you know about our company?
How do you handle criticism?
What are your hobbies and interests outside of work?
What is your ideal work environment?
Do you have any questions for us?
What are your career goals?
How do you stay updated on industry trends?
Describe your ideal manager.
What's your proudest professional accomplishment?
How do you handle failure or setbacks?
How do you define success?
What do you do when you disagree with your boss?
How do you manage your time effectively?
What software or tools are you proficient in?
Describe a time you had to learn something new quickly.
How do you ensure accuracy in your work?
What kind of work environment do you thrive in?
How do you deal with a difficult co-worker or customer?
What's your approach to problem-solving?
Are you a leader or a follower?
How do you handle a situation where you have too many priorities?
What measures do you take to improve yourself professionally?
What was the biggest mistake you made in your last job and what did you learn from it?
What do you look for in a company culture?
Is there anything else you'd like us to know about you?
